description: Move you camera until white dots will display in your screen. Touch at any white dots to start your learning!
Welcome, cell biologists! Today, we're diving deep into the fascinating world of cells,
the building blocks of all living things!  Get ready to test your knowledge by matching
descriptive terms to the essential processes that keep cells functioning!
I'll provide you with a list of terms describing cellular functions. Match each term to
the specific cellular process it represents. Are you now ready?
First, tap a block in the left side, those are the cells function
and tap a block in the right side which is the descriptive terms
if they're matched, those blocks will dissappear. Good luck!
